title: Keeping the Tour de France Femmes hype going: Riders weigh up the pros and cons of move away from Paris
content:
Start in Clermont-Ferrand is a chance for the women's peloton to 'create our own story' says Ashleigh Moolman-Pasio.

Read the full article at Keeping the Tour de France Femmes hype going: Riders weigh up the pros and cons of move away from Paris on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
